editorial.title: Unsplash
editorial.description: The internet’s source for visuals. Powered by creators everywhere.

wallpaper.title: Wallpapers
wallpaper.description: From epic drone shots to inspiring moments in nature — submit your best desktop and mobile backgrounds.

3D Renders.title: 3D Renders
3D Renders.description: The Unsplash community continues to push the boundaries of creativity through 3D Renders. From abstract worlds to photo-realistic interiors, this category celebrates exciting 3-dimensional images designed in the software of your choice and rendered into JPEG images.

nature.title: Nature
nature.description: Through photography, the beauty of Mother Nature can be frozen in time. This category celebrates the magic of our planet and beyond — from the immensity of the great outdoors, to miraculous moments in your own backyard.

travel.title: Travel
travel.description: Discover hidden wonders and inspiring destinations around the world from the comfort of your own home.

architecture & interior.title: Architecture & Interiors
architecture & interior.description: Exploring our built environments — from brutalist buildings to eccentric home decor. This category showcases the best of architecture and interiors from around the world.

street photography.title: Street Photography
street photography.description: When the streets around you become your canvas, what can you discover? From quiet passages in charming towns to the hustle and bustle of larger cities — this category examines street photography in every form.

textures & patterns.title: Textures & Patterns
textures & patterns.description: Whether you’re looking for stunning macro-photography or shots of complex architectural shapes — you’ve come to the right place.

film.title: Film
film.description: Let’s honor the beginnings of photography by celebrating analog from the past and present day. From vintage polaroids to mesmerizing 35mm shots — this category examines the best of what film photography has to offer.

experimental.title: Experimental
experimental.description: Photography has the ability to challenge perspectives and reimagine how we portray the world around us. This category explores unlikely textures, new formats and intriguing subject matter to push creativity forward.

animals.title: Animals
animals.description: Exotic wildlife, pet kittens — and everything in between. Uncover the beauty of the animal kingdom through your screen.

fashion & beauty.title: Fashion & Beauty
fashion & beauty.description: Fashion and Beauty are a powerful form of self-expression. This category documents style through inspiring shots of street fashion, skincare products, avant-garde editorial photographs, and more.

business & work.title: Business & Work
business & work.description: Reflecting the realities of the modern workplace in their many forms — from images of remote working and start-ups to shots of engineers and artists at work.

food & drink.title: Food & Drink
food & drink.description: From simple home-cooked dinners at home, to tasting new dishes while traveling — food connects us all. This category examines the world of food photography, with shots of everything from summer picnics in the park to decadent deserts.

people.title: People
people.description: Real people, captured. Photography has the power to reflect the world around us, give voice to individuals and groups within our communities — and most importantly — tell their story.

sprituality.title: Sprituality
sprituality.description: Photography has the ability to examine life’s big questions, by exploring themes of love, loss, healing and human connection.

athletics.title: Athletics
athletics.description: This category celebrates action in the every day — from the tough gym workouts, to tense basketball games, to the extreme heights of heliskiing. Get up close and personal with the raw emotions of the athlete, the frenzy of the court crowd, and the danger of challenging outdoor pursuits.

health & wellness.title: Health & Wellness
health & wellness.description: Celebrate a healthy mind, body and soul with photographs that showcase everything from new medical discoveries and alternative medicines, to healthy eating and meditation.

current events.title: Current Events
current events.description: Photographs influence how we understand the world around us. This category is all about capturing those news-worthy moments around the globe — from political protests to cultural celebrations. When submitting, please provide a photo description so we understand the full context of the image.

arts & culture.title: Arts & Culture
arts & culture.description: Your daily dose of culture — with photography showcasing the best in art, music and literature from around the world.
